channel.title: Put it on the bat ? that code from the guide?How?
channel.description:
hi i played already much servers andso they are cool but i wanted to start a server tooo so i got a source a starter : testscape(rar.) and i followed the guide i did everything what it needs but i don't know what i must to do with the last step ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ""Step 5 :
Now we need to compile.bat and runserver.bat
1.Go to ure source 2.Then u need to search for :
""compile bat.""
U will need : Textpad
[u](Then Right mouse button Then Click Textpad. Then replace evrything what there is whit this
[u]THE pink COLLORED WORDS I CLICK RIGHT CLICK MOUSE ON COMPILE but i don't see annythiing for clicking on textpad :| im just new too just need to know whats the meaning of this i think maybe i make on textpad that code and add it on the compile bat but doesent work if i double click on it it says: javac was not knowed as an and then intern or extern opdracht, program or batchbestand. ye sorry i know only a little bit english sorry for it :| click any button to continue ...)[/u][/u]
100 % Credits To Mod Taharok For Compiler :
title Error echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download echo the newest JDK Update. pause cls goto menu
Now u got that Compiler so u dont need to have Runserver.bat

item.title: Put it on the bat ? that code from the guide?How?
item.dc:creator: @ketskuuh ketskuuh
item.description:
@ketskuuh wrote:

hi i played already much servers andso they are cool but
i wanted to start a server tooo so
i got a source a starter : testscape(rar.)
and i followed the guide i did everything what it needs but
i don’t know what i must to do with the last step

""Step 5 :

Now we need to compile.bat and runserver.bat

1.Go to ure source
2.Then u need to search for :

““compile bat.””

U will need : Textpad

[u](Then Right mouse button Then Click Textpad.
Then replace evrything what there is whit this

THE pink COLLORED WORDS
I CLICK RIGHT CLICK MOUSE ON COMPILE but i don’t see annythiing for clicking on textpad im just new too just need to know whats the meaning of this
i think maybe i make on textpad that code and add it on the compile bat but doesent work if i double click on it it says:
javac was not knowed as an and then intern or extern opdracht, program or batchbestand.
ye sorry i know only a little bit english sorry for it
click any button to continue …)[/u]

100 % Credits To Mod Taharok For Compiler :

title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial
echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download
echo the newest JDK Update.
pause
cls
goto menu

Now u got that Compiler so u dont need to have Runserver.bat
